Articles.Content: My model textures doesnt export with part tools. I only can export model.mu file. Can somebody help me? PS: i am new to moding

Can somebody help me?

ok i try. Do you see your texture in unity on your model?

if no: you have to drag your texture from your assets/material on your model

if yes: does your texture have a KSP-shader? , on the right side there is a drop down-menu "shader" you have to pick a ksp-shader
I do see the textures and yes i did select ksp shaders on all models

and what texture-Format do you use in part tools?

Did you use part-tools 18 prior to 20 ( had a problem, somthing mixed and i hate to install unity again)
this belongs in other forums not in addon dev
